channel.title: Crashing Out on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Crashing Out on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Hollow Knight: Silksong’ Is Already Causing Online Gaming Stores to Crash
item.description: After years of waiting for the sequel, a lot of fans trying to buy the game are getting error messages—and they’re not happy about it.
